```{r}
if (add_study_site) {
    cat("\n\n# Study Site\n")
  
dflat <- get_variable(x, "latitude")
dflon <- get_variable(x, "longitude")
m <- leaflet::leaflet() %>%
  leaflet::addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  leaflet::addMarkers(lng = dflon$longitude, 
                      lat = dflat$latitude, 
                      popup = "Study Site")
m  # Print the map
}
```
